pass_tests.test:
Thermal_analytical_validation_two_phases = False with open("log", "rb") as f: linelist = f.readlines() # Read the first line. last = linelist[len(linelist)-1] # The last line f.close
if 'OK' in last: Thermal_analytical_validation_two_phases = True
assert(Thermal_analytical_validation_two_phases)
